options.name: Ballads
options.description: You gain the ability to play Ballads which require an Action to start and your Focus to maintain which affect anyone within 4 Units who can hear. Learn 1 Ballad of your choice.

options.name: Showmanship
options.description: You become Good at the Performance Skill

options.name: Reaction : Segue
options.description: You seamlessly change the Ballad you are playing which takes effect immediately.

options.name: Free Action : Attacca
options.description: You quickly start a new Ballad

options.name: Reaction : Motif
options.description: You Target an allied Creature who can hear a Ballad you are playing and use one of their listed Reactions. This does not count against their usage limit or consume their Reaction for this round.

options.name: Medley
options.description: While you are Focusing on a Ballad, you can use another Action to start an additional Ballad. If you lose your Focus on one, both end.

options.name: Reaction : Inspire
options.description: As a Reaction to a Creature who can hear your Ballad making a Defense, Attack or Skill Check, add 1d4 to that Check. If you are Good at Performance, add 1d6 instead.

options.name: Action : Dissonance
options.description: You suddenly end a Ballad with a harsh note or chord, forcing all Creatures that can hear your Ballad to make a Resistance Check against your Performance Check or take Psychic Damage equal to your Performance Check

options.name: Reaction : Resonating Powerchord
options.description: You finish a Ballad you have been playing for one or more rounds with an expert powerchord. This causes the effect of your Ballad to last 1 minute instead of ending instantly.

options.name: Action : Accelerando
options.description: You speed up a Ballad you are currently playing, granting all allies who can hear it an additional Free Action until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Star of the Show
options.description: Gain +1 Performance, +1 Persuasion and +4 Psychic Mitigation
